statements: SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE availability = 'Weekdays';
SELECT phone_number FROM Volunteers WHERE id IN (2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE availability LIKE '%Weekend%';
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM Volunteers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE availability = 'Weekdays';
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT name, phone_number FROM Volunteers WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, email FROM Volunteers WHERE availability = 'Weekends' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM volunteers;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, email, phone FROM volunteers WHERE phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM volunteers WHERE phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_id, COUNT(*) FROM events GROUP BY volunteer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM volunteers JOIN events ON volunteers.id = events.volunteer_id;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Volunteers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT volunteer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';

SELECT v.first_name, v.last_name, e.event_name, vs.schedule_date FROM Volunteers v JOIN Volunteer_Schedule vs ON v.volunteer_id = vs.volunteer_id JOIN Events e ON vs.event_id = e.event_id ORDER BY vs.schedule_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-10-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%';

SELECT v.first_name, v.last_name, e.event_name, vs.schedule_date FROM Volunteers v INNER JOIN Volunteer_Schedule vs ON v.volunteer_id = vs.volunteer_id INNER JOIN Events e ON e.event_id = vs.event_id;

SELECT e.event_id, e.event_name, v.first_name, v.last_name FROM Events e INNER JOIN Volunteer_Schedule vs ON e.event_id = vs.event_id INNER JOIN Volunteers v ON vs.volunteer_id = v.volunteer_id WHERE vs.schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-11-01';
SELECT * FROM volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email FROM volunteers ORDER BY volunteer_id DESC;
SELECT event_name, location FROM events WHERE event_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT volunteer_id, event_id FROM volunteer_events WHERE volunteer_id = 101;
SELECT schedule_id, event_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM volunteers
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email FROM volunteers WHERE name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT ve.volunteer_id, v.name, e.event_name FROM volunteer_events ve JOIN volunteers v ON ve.volunteer_id = v.volunteer_id JOIN events e ON ve.event_id = e.event_id WHERE v.name = 'John'
SELECT s.schedule_id, e.event_name, s.start_time, s.end_time FROM schedules s JOIN events e ON s.event_id = e.event_id WHERE e.location != 'London' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM volunteers
SELECT volunteer_id, name, age FROM volunteers
SELECT event_name, location FROM events

SELECT schedule_id, event_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules
SELECT * FROM volunteers WHERE age > 25;

SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM events WHERE event_id = 3;
SELECT volunteer_id, event_id FROM volunteer_events WHERE volunteer_id = 4 AND event_id = 2;
SELECT description FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday';
